name: Building Relationships: Foundations of Love
description:
Do you wish to know what souls lie behind your favorite famous landmarks? Do you yearn for the cold, lifeless caress of stonework? Do you have roughly half an hour to kill?

If so, then Building Relationships 1: Foundations of Love is the game for you.

Made for a 24 hour game jam, Foundations of Love was inspired by the foolish statement that "every dating sim has already been made." After some caffeine and a sleepless night, over 4,000 words of dialogue were written and a crazy, malformed idea was on its way to being an actual game.

Meet iconic landmarks as you try to figure out your place at the new architectural school--and find a date to the Groundbreaking Day Dance.
